entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione's mouth fell open as she read.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Her reaction was exactly the same as Ron's.

entities.name: skeeter woman
entities.description: How did that horrible Skeeter woman find out?

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: You don't think Hagrid told her?

entities.name: harry
entities.description: No, said Harry, leading the way over to the Gryffindor table and throwing himself into a chair, furious.

entities.name: madame maxime
entities.description: Maybe she heard him telling Madame Maxime at the ball,
